about_the_game:
You will be able to enjoy a powerful Hentai VR experience.
Feel like a VIP in a nightclub with beautiful women all to yourself!
Groping boobs and buttocks? Taking a bath with a beautiful woman? Breaking into kinky sex!
Touch the cube to activate the perverted mode.
The realistic VR environment has such high quality that you'll think it's real.

＜Game description＞
A 6DoF VR space that allows you to move in all directions.
You can freely touch your body, grab things, and enter the Jacuzzi without any limitations.
You can enjoy a highly realistic and immersive VR experience.

＜How to operate＞
You can move around, climb up and down the stairs.
Touch the cube to switch the mode.
You can see perverted sex play from many different angles.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content or themes that are appropriate only for adult.

Themes in this game include:
> Explicit consensual sex scenes
> Nakedness
> genitals
> lewd situations

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR

short_description: With the best kinky VR, you will get the most superb experience. Enjoy lots of perverted plays with the most beautiful women.
